hymn.title: O Blessed Saviour, Son of God

layout.singingstanza: Thou Son of God, our Sav -- ior dear, Through Thee re -- demp -- tion did ap -- pear, From sin and death to free. Thy saints with rap -- turous joy a -- bound, To see Thee in Thy glo -- rious crown And seat -- ed heav -- en -- ly. And seat -- ed heav -- en -- ly.

lyrics.stanza: Thou Son of God, our Savior dear, Through Thee redemption did appear, From sin and death to free. Thy saints with rapturous joy abound, To see Thee in Thy glorious crown And seated heavenly. And seated heavenly.

Love of the Father lifted Thee, Bestowed such power, majesty; At His right hand art Thou. We praise Thy wisdom, Sovereign true, And consecrate our all anew; Thou reignest ever now. Thou reignest ever now.

Head of the Church in righteousness, Thy members Thou didst fully bless: All that Thou hast is ours. Our life and power Thou become, In all our motives, set Thy throne, And conquer Satan's pow'rs. And conquer Satan's pow'rs.

Ere long that glorious day shall come, Your Body will be raptured home, To ever see Thy face. Such happy day! Thyself to see, And know that we belong to Thee, And rest in Thine embrace. And rest in Thine embrace.
